function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Provocations of right-wing parties calling for a 'return to normality' and stopping NPIs","Impact":"Risk of exacerbating the spread of contagious diseases and increasing the likelihood of future pandemics","Mitigation":"Education and communication to promote the importance of NPIs for public health","Technologies":"Communication technologies for disseminating information","People":"General population, particularly those influenced by right-wing parties","Owner":"Public health authorities, educational institutions, media outlets"},{"Description":"Overlooking the immediate health and well-being benefits of NPIs","Impact":"Missed opportunities to improve health and well-being for populations worldwide","Mitigation":"Promotion of the positive effects of NPIs on health and well-being through education and communication","Technologies":"Communication technologies for disseminating information","People":"Public health organizations, governments, media outlets","Owner":"Public health authorities, educational institutions, media outlets"}]}
